Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Sono revisore per i seguenti giornali: Journal of Computer-Mediated Communication (JCMC), Journal of Broadcasting & Electronic Media, Dove Medical Press and Child Care in Practice.
Chief statistician at CompareMySpend Ltd, London
Senior statistician and data manager at the International Energy Agency (IEA), Paris
Research and policy advisor at the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD), Paris

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: The impact of internet on the Mass Media in Europe - Action Cost A20, Delphi, Greece
Socio-Economic and Regional Development in Europe, IX Annual Seminar - University of Tampere, Finland
Socio-Economic and Statistical Studies: Integrating Theory and Research, X Annual Seminar - University of Haifa, Israel
2012 International Conference on Stillbirth, SIDS and Infant Survival - Baltimore, Maryland
3rd International Conference on the Analysis of Mobile Phone Datasets - MIT Cambridge, Massachusetts
10th International Conference on Health Policy Statistics (ICHPS 2013) - Chicago, Illinois
(Keynote speaker) Convegno Nazionale su Depressione post-partum e allattamento in tempi di crisi economica - Rubano, Italia

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Dottorato europeo in studi socio–economici e statistici, University of Southampton (UK)

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: ABTA Doctoral Researcher Award (2013) Assegnato da: ABTA - Association of British Turkish Academics 1st prize: best PhD in the UK - Category: Management and Social Sciences

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Research assistant for Professor Luigi Zingales in the Templeton Project - University of Chicago, Booth Business School
Membro del gruppo di lavoro per la valutazione del Progetto Nazionale Genitori Piú con il Professor Stefano Campostrini - Università "Ca' Foscari" Venezia, Dipartimento di Statistica
Assistente di ricerca per il Professor Erich Battistin - Università degli Studi di Padova, Dipartimento di Scienze Statistiche
Senior research assistant for Professor Milena Buchs - University of Southampton, School of Social Sciences
Senior research assistant for Dr Sonia Heaven in the VALORGAS project (EU funded) - University of Southampton, School of Engineering

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Visiting researcher at the University of Southampton
